bug.short_desc: CVE-2016-8867: ambient capability usage in containers (privilege escalation)
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
privilege escalation: Docker 1.12.2 does not correctly apply user permissions in containers
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
docker-1.12.2
How reproducible:
always
Steps to Reproduce: 1. https://github.com/docker/docker/issues/27590 2. 3.
Actual results:
Expected results:
Additional info:
fixed in docker-1.12.3
fixed in docker-1.12.3 - I'm rebuilding for F25
docker-1.12.3-2.git91ae1d1.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-8e1558d1c6

docker-1.12.3-2.git91ae1d1.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
